name: Avoid insecure use of YAML deserialization when using SnakeYaml (JEE)
Always implement readObject() to prevent untrusted deserialization when loading from ObjectInputStream
Avoid using Rest Plugin with XStream handler to deserialise XML requests in Struts 2.1.2 - Struts 2.3.33, Struts 2.5 - Struts 2.5.12
